@graph.name: Merchant Cash Advance - BitX Funding
@graph.description: BitX Funding is a lending partner that offers true Merchant Cash Advance with automatic fixed or percentage of sales daily or weekly payments via ACH Debit from merchant’s business bank account . If you're looking to finance a project that has an immediate return on investment such as updating or refreshing your location, inventory deals with a quick turnaround, marketing campaigns, seasonal hiring, or high demand inventory a Merchant Cash Advance loans are for you. They range from $5,000 to $500,000 with terms of 6 to 18 months and the cost of capital varies by term. Call to find out today if you are pre-approved.

@graph.name: Todd Rowe
@graph.description: Todd Rowe is the president and founder of BitX Funding and brings over 20 years of experience in managing sales for rapidly growing organizations. Previously, he served as Director of Sales for Paychex Inc. In this role, Todd grew the client base from 200 to over 3,000 small business owners – landing him in the top 1% of the company ten years in a row. Todd has also held various Senior Management Positions including serving as Senior Business Development Manager at OnDeck Capital, Inc. a 2007 small business financing start up, Director of Sales at TriNet, Inc. a professional employer organization and Public Sector Account Executive at Sprint. Todd holds a Bachelor Degree in Business Administration from New England College and is a Fairfield Chamber of Commerce Board Member.
